name: Hazelnut Brownies - No Bake Brownies
description: Hazelnut Walnut Brownies - No Bake Brownies with dates, roasted hazelnuts and walnuts. Easy Fudgy No Bake Vegan Brownies. No Bake Nutella Brownies. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe.

video.name: Hazelnut Walnut Brownies -  No Bake Option Glutenfree | VEGAN RICHA RECIPES
video.description:
Hazelnut Walnut Brownies – No Bake Brownies with Dates, Roasted Hazelnuts and Walnuts. 
❤ FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2017/03/hazelnut-brownies-no-bake-brownies.html

Easy Fudgy Vegan Brownies. These Fudgy Brownies are No Bake if you have already roasted Hazelnuts! These brownie bites are like nutella brownies, but no need to make nutella and of course no palm oil or dairy. Just 6 INGREDIENTS in the brownies, toasted hazelnuts, walnuts, dates, cocoa and some maple. I top these with a creamy non dairy chocolate ganache. So good! Serve these with a simple vegan vanilla ice cream or some whipped coconut cream. 

These bars are easy, fudgy and perfect for the sweet snack attack! Make these and let me know how they turned out! You can use all walnuts and skip the toasting step to omit hazelnuts. Or use hazelnut butter or other toasted nut butter. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe.


❤ BUY MY COOKBOOK Vegan Richa's Everyday Kitchen: Epic Anytime Recipes with a World of Flavor!: http://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen

recipeIngredient: 1 cup raw hazelnuts or unsalted roasted
1 cup soft medjool dates ( pitted and roughly chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: For raw hazelnuts, Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spread the hazelnuts on a baking sheet in a single layer. Roast for 10 to 14 minutes if raw (shake one in between) and 4 or 5 minutes to heat up if roasted. Cool Slightly and put on a kitchen towel. Rub with the towel to remove as many skins as you can. Or use pre-roasted hazelnuts (remove skin in a towel before using).
recipeInstructions.name: For raw hazelnuts, Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spread the hazelnuts on a baking sheet in a single layer. Roast for 10 to 14 minutes if raw (shake one in between) and 4 or 5 minutes to heat up if roasted. Cool Slightly and put on a kitchen towel. Rub with the towel to remove as many skins as you can. Or use pre-roasted hazelnuts (remove skin in a towel before using).

recipeInstructions.text: Add just the hazelnuts without skin to a food processor or high speed blender. Blend until starting to get buttery. *
recipeInstructions.name: Add just the hazelnuts without skin to a food processor or high speed blender. Blend until starting to get buttery. *

recipeInstructions.text: Add walnuts and pulse until a coarse meal. Add dates and cocoa, vanilla and salt and pulse to mix in and until the dates break down into the mixture. Add maple syrup to help the mixture stick. Taste and adjust sweet and chocolate (add more cocoa).
recipeInstructions.name: Add walnuts and pulse until a coarse meal. Add dates and cocoa, vanilla and salt and pulse to mix in and until the dates break down into the mixture. Add maple syrup to help the mixture stick. Taste and adjust sweet and chocolate (add more cocoa).

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a parchment lined pan and pat down to a rectangle.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to a parchment lined pan and pat down to a rectangle.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Ganache: Heat the non dairy milk and coconut oil over medium heat in a saucepan. when boiling take off heat. Add the chocolate sugar and vanilla and let sit for a minute. Whisk until smooth. Pour over the brownies. Chill for an hour, slice and serve. Let the brownies come close to room temperature before serving. Store on the counter for upto 2 days, Store refrigerated for upto a week.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Ganache: Heat the non dairy milk and coconut oil over medium heat in a saucepan. when boiling take off heat. Add the chocolate sugar and vanilla and let sit for a minute. Whisk until smooth. Pour over the brownies. Chill for an hour, slice and serve. Let the brownies come close to room temperature before serving. Store on the counter for upto 2 days, Store refrigerated for upto a week.
